favoriteThings.title: VideoGame
favoriteThings.description: I enjoy playing Role Playing Games(RPG) such as the Final Fantasy series, First Person Shooting/Shooter(FPS) games such as Call of Duty(COD) and Black Ops(BO), arcade games such as Metal Slug

favoriteThings.title: Movie
favoriteThings.description: I enjoyy watching movies of all genres, action, horror, comedies, documentaries, drama, sci-fi, thrillers, and anime

favoriteThings.title: Food
favoriteThings.description: I love, LOVE food! I mean, who doesn't!? I enjoy food off all nationalities from Asian, Mexican, Thai, Greek, Italian, and American food.
